Container.Name: Howler
Container.Overview: Howler is a log file monitoring application that allows you to setup notifications for specific events in log files. Currently Discord, Gotify, and Slack are supported notification platforms. Unlike other log analysis tools, Howler is simple and easy to configure.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: log logging alert notification monitoring monitor splunk grafana loki

Config.Name: DATASOURCE1
Config.Description: Map this to the location of the log files you would like to monitor. You can add as many PATH's as you need for additional directories.
